content: Yes, many of these sustainable fashion brands have physical stores in addition to their online presence. Patagonia has stores in many cities across the United States and other countries as well. Reformation has physical stores located in major cities across the US, including New York, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Eileen Fisher and People Tree also have their own stores, as do Stella McCartney, Veja, and Everlane. It is always a good idea to check a brand's website for information on store locations, as well as hours and any COVID-19 safety measures that may be in place.
